roleset.name: supervise, watch over

example.name: stated regulator
example.text: The finding probably will support those who argue that the U.S. should regulate the class of asbestos including crocidolite more stringently than the common kind of asbestos, chrysotile, found in most schools and other buildings, Dr. Talcott said.
example.arg: the class of asbestos including crocidolite
more stringently than the common kind of asbestos, chrysotile, found in most schools and other buildings

example.name: unstated agent
example.text: ``Such research may ultimately result in the ability [*] to regenerate damaged tissues or to turn off genes that cause cancer'' or *trace* to regulate genes that cause Down's syndrome, the leading cause of mental retardation, according to an NIH summary.
example.arg: genes that cause Down's syndrome, the leading cause of mental retardation, according to an NIH summary

roleset.note: Frames file for 'regulate' based on wsj; adjectival 'regulated' based on BOLT-4,5. No Vncls.

example.name: adjectival rel: regulated
example.text: I 'm not against immigration but i think it should be more regulated .
